Johnny tried very hard to think about something else as Kyle touched him all over his body. The measuring tape wasn't particularly erotic, but at 17, it never took much. He managed to keep things under control, and Kyle quickly finished.

Feeling risky, Kyle gave Johnny a quick kiss, and told him the doctor would be in soon. He left.

Johnny looked around the room. It looked almost exactly like the exam room at his normal doctor's office. Even the feeling of being down to his underwear was uncomfortable and familiar. The big difference he noticed was that this room had a full-length, extra wide mirror. Johnny stood up and looked himself over.

He was once again reminded of why everyone was sure he was adopted into his family. He was incredibly skinny. He looked and felt unhealthy looking at his reflection, where he could practically see a couple ribs. He reminded himself this was why he signed up for the experiment. The extra money would allow him to pay for the food that was going to be necessary to overcome his metabolism.

Johnny sat back down on the exam table just before the doctor came in. The doctor smiled and said, "You may want to put on a gown from the back closet there."

Johnny opened up the closet in the back and pulled a gown from the rack. He pulled the smallest one, but noticed that they went up to enormous sizes. When he put it on and sat back down, the smiling doctor asked him some questions.

"So how did you find your way to us today?"
"Uh, I got an e-mail. It said I had been selected."
The doctor noted this. "I'm looking at your family history here. Judging by your family's weights, I'd say you're the odd man out for them."
"Yeah."
"Is that something you'd like to change?"
"Yeah, actually. A lot of people don't even think we're related."
"Hm."

The doctor took notes quickly and moved on. "Let me tell you a little bit about what we're doing here, because at this point you have a choice. We are currently running several simultaneous experiments, and you qualify for a couple of them. As you probably read, we're studying some digestive aids and supplements. We're actually studying quite a few, and need to test each of them individually. You qualify for two of the tests. While I can't tell you exactly what each of them do, as that could influence the test, I can tell you that one is a 2-week course of supplements, and one is a 6-week course of supplements. You are paid according to time, and so you have a choice. Would you prefer the shorter course or the longer one?"

15232111.content:
Johnny agreed to the six week option and the doctor smiled again. He led Johnny out of the exam room and down the hallway, into a much larger room with more sophisticated equipment.

"We're going to do a full body scan. Please stand between the two large panels over there. It won't hurt, but you will feel something."

Johnny stepped between two very large panels. A bright light emerged on either side of him, and began to slide down slowly, passing over his whole body. He closed his eyes. He could feel a vivid tingling and warming sensation over his whole body as the light passed over. When it finished, the tingling remained for a minute.

The doctor then gave Johnny two bottles of pills, each with only a serial number and barcode. The first was filled with large, orange capsules. "Take one of these every morning when you get up, and every evening before you go to bed."

The other bottle was much larger, but full of tiny blue pills. "Take one of these before you eat, every time you eat."

The doctor then handed Johnny a credit card. "You can charge all meals to this card. They're considered part of operational expenses, and are covered under your pay."

"Come back in three days."

Johnny was ecstatic. He'd taken this job to get enough money to buy extra food, and now, in addition to his pay, they were telling him his food was all expenses paid. He wasn't sure if he was hungrier than usual or the card was just burning a hole in his pocket, but he decided to immediately celebrate at the fast food joint around the corner. He ordered a combo meal, super-sized it and added extra fries and a shake. When he paid for the meal, he got an odd smile from the cashier, who seemed to recognize the card. When the meal came, all the fries were brimming more than usual, and they had thrown in an extra order of nuggets and an apple pie to boot. The tray looked overfull, more like it was a meal for three people. Johnny didn't think he would finish it, but didn't complain either. He was very hungry.

He just remembered to pop a blue pill before starting.

He ate the burger quickly, and interspersed the fries as he went. He had to refill his soda twice as he devoured the second set of fries and nuggets, and finally moved on to the apple pie. To his surprise, not only did he finish the whole meal, he did it in 15 minutes. He didn't want to eat anymore, but he didn't seem to feel stuffed. Looking down, however, his belly said otherwise. It was distended and tight, and aggressively so. Johnny decided to go home.

It was a half-hour drive, and Johnny was surprised how comfortable he was. Usually when he was this stuffed, which happened from time to time, he'd barely be able to sit straight. But now it felt comfortable, and natural, as if the belly wasn't bloated but always like this. Johnny enjoyed the sensation. When he arrived home, his mother was in the kitchen with his father, and they were both preparing a huge meal for the evening. There were mashed potatoes boiling, a pot roast filling the whole kitchen with a wonderful smell, and vegetables being sauteed, smothered in butter and oil. Much to his surprise, Johnny found himself hungry again. And by the time dinner was ready, another half-hour later, Johnny's stomach had deflated.

Johnny popped another blue pill in the bathroom before dinner, and sat down to the family table. For the first time since anyone could remember, he matched his brother's appetite. His parents didn't say anything, but it clearly did not go unnoticed. After dinner, Johnny once again was stuffed but didn't feel it. His taut belly felt comfortable and natural, though small in comparison to his family.

After dinner, Johnny went up to his room and called Kyle. Kyle was just getting off work, which apparently kept him late, and they agreed to meet at the fast food place near his house. It was about an hour after dinner, and once again Johnny's stomach was flat. They met at the restaurant and Johnny ordered for both of them. Kyle's eyes flashed when he saw the credit card. It was clear that he recognized it as well, but refused to say anything.

Johnny repeated his previous order, while Kyle only had a chicken sandwich and soda. Strangely enough, when their order was delivered, this new place made the same additions to Johnny's order. Johnny popped a blue pill and ate all the food again. A little slower, since he was talking with Kyle, but not much. His distended belly once again felt comfortable, especially when Kyle rubbed it under the table.

Kyle was tired, and so they parted ways and went to bed. Johnny made sure to take the orange pill before falling asleep.

153311.content:
It was a pretty slow day for Kyle. He was spinning a penny on its side, thinking.

He was pretty worried about Johnny. Johnny was always insecure about his weight. He liked being conventionally pretty (and Kyle did too- they were both vain, but appreciated each other's looks.).

However, he'd been taking things too far, and his recent decision to lose even more weight was beyond the pale.

So Kyle went to the library.

Being the bookish sort (Kyle sometimes wore glasses specifically for the occasion, but didn't want to look nerdy), he decided to go to the library and take out a book on eating disorders.

The library was a run-down place, full of old books. All was quiet- perfect for a library, poor for making people feel too comfortable.

After searching for over half an hour, there was no sign of a book on eating disorders. He was pretty sure that it was that way because eating disorders are a more modern problem. Figures, he thought, and he was about to leave, when something caught his eye.

It was a bookshelf that he'd never seen before.

He looked at the books on it. They were all written in what he was pretty sure was Old English. One of them looked particularly attractive. It was purple with gold lining around it.

He blew the dust off it, opened it up, and took a look at the first page.

Eest seen se greene so wepes do keene;
Tal Anarin, por morach.

It...looked like Olde English, but it didn't mean anything as far as he was sure. As for the second line, it was even more unusual- like no other language.
153311.title: Magic

Kyle reads the first page aloud.

Suddenly, but silently, the bookcase hovers to the right, and a hole opens up in the wall.

Should he step inside?

He walks about 10 paces before the wall suddenly reverts back, shutting him inside!

Hm, looks like food. Let's fatten him up and eat him!

"No, Ceelatrix, we won't eat him."

He turns to Kyle.

"What are you doing here? This area is forbidden to mortals!"

"But all I had to do was read a book in a public libary!"

The man strokes his chin. Perhaps, he was thinking, it wasn't such a good idea to have a secret lair in such an open location.

"But this is the 21st century! No one even reads books!"

"Hey, out of curiosity, when that freaky thing-"

I am an imp, simpleton!, hissed the imp.

"Imp, whatever. Anyway, when he threatened to fatten me up, where would he get the food? Because this is, like, the middle of nowhere, in a narrow corridor. And I am fuckin' HUNGRY."

He was indeed quite hungry, as could be told from the profane superlative.

"There is none. But, we do know some magic which is quite potent for fattening people. But we don't actually have any spells to make food. Don't be stupid, boy, why would anyone want those?"

The imp laughed heartily at Kyle's expense.

Kyle was quite disappointed, because he could have gone for a magical cheeseburger about that time. Then he suddenly realized the potential here.

"Hey, do you mind showing me some weight-gain magic before you teleport me out of here or whatever?"

The wizard and imp looked at each other. "Hm, alright. We can show you one spell. But be sure to write it down."

"But I don't have any pen and paper-"

"Bloody hell, you college students are USELESS at organizational skills! Here, I'll just magic up some pen and paper for you then."

A sheet of plain white paper and a pen materialized themselves into Kyle's hands.

"Okay, listen up.

Irsen, sheno adao-sanjen!"

Kyle copied that down to the best of his ability.

"How do I use it?"

"You must cast the spell on a vial of the blood of your target's relative, mixed with some kind of fat. When they eat, the fat goes to the target.

"Kick-ass!"

"Alright, you have what you want. Now leave this area at once!"

And with that, the wizard teleported Kyle back outside of the library.

Kyle, pretty content with the results of his latest escapade, proceeded back to his house to practice the incantation. He knew that he would have to get the blood for it to work, and it would have to be one of Johnny's family.

But who?
